headline: LANSMONT SHOCK TEST SYSTEM 40 LB. PAYLOAD
description: Shock Machine    The 15D Shock Test System is ideal for testing small, lightweight components and devices. The standard table generates nearly ideal half-sine shock pulses. A mounting hole pattern on both the top and front surfaces of the table allows testing in two orientations simultaneously.
categories.lvl1: Material / Physical Testing Equipment > Vibration and Shock
categories.lvl2: Material / Physical Testing Equipment  >  Vibration and Shock > Shock Machines
